item.title: How do I make a Server?
item.dc:creator: @adog17x adog17x
item.description:
@adog17x wrote:

uh…

  1. fire you need a source…go to downloads section and download one you like
    2.after u get your source and extract it go to run.batsever and fix it so it can run your server.
    3.downlaod hamachi at i think www.hamachi.cc
    4.then you should get your ip for ur server
    5.go to client.java and when you learn to code start coding
    6.get moparclient before that
    7.when you run your server check the black box for the port and add it to your moparclient at top were it says file>port>insert number
    8.get on your server and enjoy
    9.Go to download sectio nwhen your server is ok with you

YOUR ALL DONE HOPEFULLY

DONT FORGET TO DOWNLOAD THE NEWSEST VERSION OF JAVA

Read full topic
